title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when set an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' is set in the data set, the result set is incorrect or null.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set with the filter expression 'row[0] equals to'.
EB: As per the developer, the filter expression 'row[0]' should not be used as it can only be generated after all the data is fetched.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to'
2. Click on the Preview tab
